message: Greetings, everyone! I’m P8, and I’m really looking forward to the excitement and shifting alliances this game will bring. May each of us find a strong path—and perhaps a few trustworthy friends—along the way. Good luck to all!

Hello everyone, I'm P1! I'm excited to start this game and see how alliances will form and shift throughout the rounds. I'm looking forward to getting to know each of you better and finding common ground to work together. Let's make this a game to remember! Good luck to all, and may the best player win!

Good luck to everyone, and may the odds be ever in your favor, I guess.
